oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: British issue gas mask and bag
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This British gas mask and canvas bag was carried by Pvt. James McFerren Johnston, HQ Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. The 30th Div. consisted of National Guard units from Tennessee and the Carolinas and served under the British. They often received British equipment while under their command in Europe. The inside flap has stamped marking "1918" and "3". Johnston has hand written his serial number and initials on the lower back of the bag.
